name: onday
description: Get some historical event on the given date (day / month)
author: frankc60

scripts.production: npm run version:bump --silent && rm -f onday.min.js && npm run minifyJS --silent && npm run version:add --silent
scripts.version:add:
echo "/**
 * ${npm_package_name} v.$(npm run version:extract --silent)
 * Â©$(date '+%Y')
 * ${npm_package_repository_url}
 * Build time: $(date '+%d-%b-%Y %H:%M:%S')
 */
$(cat ${npm_package_main})" > ${npm_package_main}
scripts.version:extract: cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]'
